sourcesContent:
import "./EventItem.css"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const EventItem = (props) => { const firstname = useSelector((state) => state.user.userFirst) const username = useSelector((state) => state.user.username) return (

{firstname}

@{props.authorUsername}

{props.sport}#{props.level}
{props.county === props.city ? props.county : props.county + ', ' + props.city}
{props.location.length >= 2 ? Place: {props.location} : null}
{props.description}

  • Date

    {props.date}

  • Start:

    {props.time}

  • Joined

    1/{props.nrPlayers}

  • Who can join:

    {props.allowed === false ? 'Everyone' : `${props.level}`}

); }; export default EventItem;
